allow: Bash(docker exec stocksim-postgres sh -c "echo ''host all all 0.0.0.0/0 md5'' >> /var/lib/postgresql/data/pg_hba.conf && cat /var/lib/postgresql/data/pg_hba.conf | tail -5")
Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d postgres -c "ALTER USER postgres WITH PASSWORD ''password'';")
Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocksim -c "SELECT email, username FROM users LIMIT 5;")

Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocksim -c "SELECT id, symbol, trade_type, quantity, price, total_value, executed_at FROM trades ORDER BY executed_at DESC LIMIT 1;")

Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocksim -c "SELECT symbol, quantity, average_cost FROM holdings WHERE portfolio_id = ''61f79b37-d428-4eb2-bb92-277ecd2e86f8'' ORDER BY created_at DESC;")
